required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Prospective, Multi-center, Real-world Study of Ovarian Metastatic Colorectal Cancer Patients
clinical_study.official_title: Impact of Different Treatment Strategies on the Prognosis of Ovarian Metastatic Colorectal Cancer Patients: a Prospective, Multi-center, Real-world Study

collaborator.agency: Cancer Hospital of China Medical University, Liaoning Cancer Hospital & Institute

brief_summary.textblock: This prospective, multi-center, real-world study is conducted to investigate the impact of different treatment strategies (systemic chemotherapy combined with oophorectomy or with other local treatment or chemotherapy alone) on the prognosis of ovarian metastatic colorectal cancer patients.

detailed_description.textblock: This study prospectively collects data of patients diagnosed with ovarian metastatic colorectal cancer, meeting inclusion criteria and signing the informed consent. Patients' treatment strategies and survival outcome in the real world will be faithfully recorded.

primary_outcome.description: Calculated from the date of diagnosis with ovarian metastasis to death (caused by cancer) or last follow-up time.

secondary_outcome.description: Response rate of ovarian metastases to systemic chemotherapy
Response rate of extra-ovarian metastases to systemic chemotherapy
Survival time from treatment start to disease progression or death.

biospec_descr.textblock: samples of ovarian metastases if available

study_pop.textblock: Patients diagnosed with ovarian metastatic colorectal cancer.

facility.name: Cancer Hospital of China Medical University, Liaoning Cancer Hospital & Institute
West China Hospital of Sichuan University
